org.lenskit.eval.traintest.metrics

Class MetricLoaderHelper

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object

    Helper for loading metrics from the classpath.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetricLoaderHelper

        public MetricLoaderHelper(ClassLoader cl,
                  String baseName)
                   throws IOException

        Create a new loader helper.

        Parameters:
        cl - The class loader.
        baseName - The base name for files to look for; will load from META-INF/lenskit/baseName.properteis.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an error loading the properties.

    • Method Detail

      • findClass

        public Class<?> findClass(String name)

        Look up the class implementing a metric by name.

        Parameters:
        name - The metric name.
        Returns:
        The metric class.

      • tryInstantiate

        public Object tryInstantiate(String name)

        Try to instantiate a metric.

        Parameters:
        name - The metric name (case-insensitive; will be looked up in lowercase).
        Returns:
        The metric, or null if no such metric can be found.

      • getMetricTypeName

        public String getMetricTypeName(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)

        Get the metric type name from a node. If the node is a string, the string is returned; otherwise, the object’s type property is returned.

        Parameters:
        node - The node.
        Returns:
        The type name.
